revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Watmel |image = [[File:Watmel.png]] |caption = A bounty of nature that is exceedingly sweet. The Berry is huge, with some discovered that exceed 20 inches. |growtime = 4h 36m 0s |harvest = 32 berries |replant = 10% |points = 1,000 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *30 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Watmel''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Magost]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of sweet and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Magost]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Harvest Stages durations ! !! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 0-2300s || 2300-3400s || 3400-9800s || 9800-16560s || 16560-33120s |- ! Animation | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:WatmelTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:WatmelTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:WatmelTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Watmel berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Magost.png|30px]]
